com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23
Class ID3v23TagHeader

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.id3v23.ID3v23TagHeader

public class ID3v23TagHeader
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for reading and writing ID3V2.3 tag header. The ID3v2 tag header is 10 bytes long and is the first information in the ID3v2.3 tag.

See Also:
ID3 tag version 2.3.0 standard, wikipedia history of ID3 tags

Field Detail

ID3V2_3_TAG_HEADER_STANDARD_SIZE

public static final int ID3V2_3_TAG_HEADER_STANDARD_SIZE
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ID3v23TagHeader

public ID3v23TagHeader()
The default constructor is called when creating a new tag header. The default values used are:
  • tag size is 0 bytes
  • no unsynchronization
  • no extended header present
  • experimental indicator is false

ID3v23TagHeader

public ID3v23TagHeader(java.io.FileInputStream file)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       ID3v23InvalidTagException
This constructor is called when reading in an existing tag header from an .mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - input stream pointing to the tag header in the .mp3 file.
Throws:
ID3v23InvalidTagException - if the .mp3 file does not contain an ID3v2.3 tag header.
java.io.IOException - if the tag header can not be read.
Method Detail

isDirty

public boolean isDirty()
indicates whether or not the tag header's fields have been modified.

Returns:
whether or not the tag header has been modified.

isExtendedHeaderPresent

public boolean isExtendedHeaderPresent()
Inidcates whether the optional extended header is present. If it is, you may then acess the extendedHeaderSize, CRCDataPresent, paddingSize, and optionally the CRCData fields.

Returns:
whether the optional extended header is present.
See Also:
setExtendedHeaderPresent(boolean)

setExtendedHeaderPresent

public void setExtendedHeaderPresent(boolean extendedHeaderPresent)
sets whether the optional extended header is present. If false, all extended header fields (paddingSize and CRCData) are erased. If true, then subsequent calls to the setCRCData(byte[]) and setPaddingSize(int) are enabled.

Parameters:
extendedHeaderPresent - boolean indicating whether the optional extended header is present.
See Also:
isExtendedHeaderPresent()

isExperimentalIndicator

public boolean isExperimentalIndicator()
Indicates whether the ID3v2.3 tag is in an experimental stage. I have no idea why this is useful.

Returns:
whether the ID3v2.3 tag is in an experimental stage.
See Also:
setExperimentalIndicator(boolean)

setExperimentalIndicator

public void setExperimentalIndicator(boolean experimentalIndicator)

Parameters:
experimentalIndicator - boolean indicating whether the tag is in an experimental stage.
See Also:
isExperimentalIndicator()

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns:
the size of the tag header and the extended header, if present.

getTagSize

public int getTagSize()
Gets the size of the ID3v2.3 tag excluding the tag header.

Returns:
the size of the tag excluding the standard tag header. That is, total tag size - 10.
See Also:
setTagSize(int)

setTagSize

public void setTagSize(int tagSize)
sets the size of the tage excluding this tag header, ie (total tag size - 10).

Parameters:
tagSize - the size of the tage excluding the tag header.
See Also:
getTagSize()

getPaddingSize

public int getPaddingSize()
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Gets the size of the padding which is found after the end of the ID3v2.3 tag and before the actual audio portion of the .mp3 file.

Returns:
the size of the padding which is found at the end of the ID3v2.3 tag.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the extendedHeaderPresent flag is not true. The extendedHeaderPresent flag must be true in order to call this method.
See Also:
setPaddingSize(int)

setPaddingSize

public void setPaddingSize(int paddingSize)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Sets the size of the padding which is found after the end of the ID3v2.3 tag and before the actual audio portion of the .mp3 file.

Parameters:
paddingSize - the size of the padding.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the extendedHeaderPresent flag is not true. The extendedHeaderPresent flag must be true in order to call this method.

getCRCData()

setBuffer

public void setBuffer()
if the tag header's values have been modified, then resize the raw binary buffer and store the new values there. When finished, reset the dirty flag to indicate that the buffer is up to date, and the tag header is now ready to be saved to the .mp3 file.

save

public void save(java.io.FileOutputStream file)
          throws java.io.IOException
save the ID3v2.3 tag header to the .mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - file output stream pointing to the starting location of the ID3v2.3 tag header within the .mp3 file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing the ID3v2.3 tag header to the .mp3 file.

save

public void save(java.io.RandomAccessFile file)
          throws java.io.IOException
save the ID3v2.3 tag header to the .mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - random access file pointing to the starting location of the ID3v2.3 tag header within the .mp3 file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing the ID3v2.3 tag header to the .mp3 file.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Gets a string representation of the ID3v2.3 tag header showing the values of all the tag header's fields as well as the extended header's fields if it is present.

a string representation of the ID3v2.3 tag header.
